org.deeplearning4j.earlystopping.scorecalc

Class DataSetLossCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.earlystopping.scorecalc.DataSetLossCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ScoreCalculator

    public class DataSetLossCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScoreCalculator
    Given a DataSetIterator: calculate the total loss for the model on that data set. Typically used to calculate the loss on a test set.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      DataSetLossCalculator(DataSetIterator dataSetIterator, boolean average)
      Calculate the score (loss function value) on a given data set (usually a test set)

      • DataSetLossCalculator

        public DataSetLossCalculator(DataSetIterator dataSetIterator,
                     boolean average)
        Calculate the score (loss function value) on a given data set (usually a test set)
        Parameters:
        dataSetIterator - Data set to calculate the score for
        average - Whether to return the average (sum of loss / N) or just (sum of loss)
